title: Computing the Mean
body: A study involving stress is conducted among the students on a college campus. The stress scores follow a uniform distribution with the lowest stress score equal to one and the highest equal to five. The individual stress scores follow a uniform distribution, X ~ $$ \cup (1,5)$$ where a $$=$$ $$1$$ and $$b$$ $$=$$ $$5$$, Using a sample of $$75$$ students, to solve the following questions
